articles.title: Trump Sets New Tariff Rates, Shifts Timeline In Latest Trade Twist
articles.description: President Trump unveiled sweeping tariffs on dozens of countries late Thursday, shifting timelines to clinch agreements. He announced a new deadline of August 7 for steep tariffs on more than 60 countries, giving officials more time to implement them while extending the runway for the White House to land more deals.

articles.title: Kyiv mourns after deadliest attack in a year kills 31 people in Ukraine, including 5 children
articles.description: Kyiv is mourning after the deadliest attack in a year, which killed 31 people, including 5 children. The attack involved Russian missile strikes.

articles.title: Prajwal Revanna, former JD(S) MP, convicted in rape case
articles.description: Prajwal Revanna, former Janata Dal (Secular) MP, has been convicted in a rape case by a Special Court. This is the first case in which the trial has been completed, out of three rape cases and one sexual harassment case against him.
